Class com.polk.utils.Sort 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----com.polk.utils.Sort
public class Sort
extends Object
Some sort utilities. Currenlty, only shell sort implemented. Sorts in either direction.

ASCENDING
Sort the array with smallest element first.
DESCENDING
Sort the array with largest element first.

Sort()

shell(Comparable[], int)
A standard shell sort.

ASCENDING 
 public static final int ASCENDING
Sort the array with smallest element first.

DESCENDING 
 public static final int DESCENDING
Sort the array with largest element first.

A standard shell sort.
